name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Mass Effect - Andromeda Costume Pack
summary:
DISCOVER A NEW GALAXY
Star charts at the ready, Sack Gang.

Create your own wild missions through the far reaches of the galaxy by dressing up your LBP pals as characters from the thrilling RPG adventure, Mass Effect Andromeda.

This pack features costumes of:
• N7 Armor: Sackboy charges into battle in the iconic Pathfinder threads.
• Drack: Enemies freeze in fear at the sight of Big Toggle dressed as the Krogan warrior.
• Initiative Armor: Only the bravest recruits are chosen for daring missions - including Little Toggle.
• Wraith: A fierce creature faithful to the mysterious Kett alien race. OddSock needs to perfect his growling.
• Poc: Swoop can spy on your enemies from above dressed as a covert drone.
